body.p: I have this moment been shown the herewith enclosed list of names to the Petition of James Weaver for pardon Among whom I find the names of the gentlemen of the 1st respectability Indeed I am satisfied that Young Weaver has already been punished more than Commensurate with his offense and should you think proper to interpose in his behalf I make no doubt he will be more careful in future
I am well acquainted with young Weaver and Know he is not a visicious ill disposed young man and would be rejoiced to know you had pardoned him
